itunes:title: Episode 892 - The Biden Burisma Effect
title: Episode 892 - The Biden Burisma Effect
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the messy exit in Afghanistan, Biden's press conference after our last plane left the tarmac yesterday, and why leaving a country that has an estimated 1.8 billion barrels of oil in natural deposits, as well as 1.7...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the messy exit in Afghanistan, Biden's press conference after our last plane left the tarmac yesterday, and why leaving a country that has an estimated 1.8 billion barrels of oil in natural deposits, as well as 1.75 trillion cubic feet of natural gas and at least 73 million tons of coal deposits to Russia and China not only seem like a bad idea... but almost feel intentional.  Who is truly behind this decision???
